title: Trudeau promises 75% wage subsidy for businesses hit by coronavirus - Global News
description: Trudeau promises 75% wage subsidy for businesses hit by coronavirus Global News Trudeau announces major wage subsidy hike for small businesses CTV News Coronavirus outbreak: Trudeau, ministers address Canadians on COVID-19 response | LIVE Global News EDITORIA…
content: The federal wage subsidy for small and medium sized businesses hit by the new coronavirus pandemic is jumping up to per cent the prime minister announced on Friday Prime Minister Justin Trudeau spoke with reporters at his daily update from Rideau Cottag chars
